text: Motion
...oh, what...?

Tenka...?
What happened?

Uhm...
I think I... forgot my pen...
──Huh... Here it is...!

Oh, wait...
That's not Tenka's pen though...

Wha...?
So whose pen may it be?

Hmm... It is so shiny,
so it must be Na-chan's... I think...

Amana's, you say?
Could it be that she put it in the wrong bag?

Hmm, well...
Doubt it...

Na-chan thought Tenka would forget it...
And she put it in Tenka's bag or something...

Ah, I see...!
Amana sure knows how to prepare.

Mhm...
Na-chan is always so... Amazing...!

That's why...
Tenka... relies on Na-chan so much...
...Is that so?

Na-chan can do absolutely anything...
You can trust her with anything...
Like whenever Mama is away for work...

Be it food or cleaning...
Na-chan will do all of this...

Also...
She will help Tenka with difficult homework...!
Haha, I see.

On top of that...
When Tenka... overslept earlier today...

Na-chan even...
helped me set my hair up...!

Wow, so amazing of her...
Amana...

Yes...!
Nihehe...

However...
What if Amana wasn't arou-
I'm just theorizing!

Let's say... Amana decides to start living on her own.
What would you do then, Tenka?
Ow...

Living on her own...
Uhm, yes...

...If Na-chan... says she wants to start living on
her own... Tenka will not try to stop her...

Since that'll be what Na-chan wants...
And Tenka considers her choices... To be important...

Mhm.
...I see.

──That's why...
To make such scenario go smoothly...

Tenka shall start learning how to do more...
things on her own, or something like that...?

Haha!
...indeed, you're very smart, Tenka.

...but... the only thing...
Tenka can do herself now...
Is telling Na-chan to please not go away...!
What...?!

...So... Once I'm back home,
I will try telling Na-chan so...!
